staticherobanner.description: Favorite Alpine Queso? Nope, it’s our frequently asked questions for information on natural gas.
staticherobanner.title: FAQs

terms_landing.heading: FAQs
terms_landing.termslist:
[{"termstitle":"Can you give me information on natural gas\, like about how Ohio's Customer Choice works\, as well as deregulation?"\,"termsdescription":"

We sure can.

\\n

1.     Your natural gas service consists of two functions: 1) purchasing the gas and 2) distributing the gas.

\\n

2.     Your gas utility will continue to distribute gas to your location\, send you your bill\, check for gas leaks and respond to emergencies.

\\n

3.     But for purchasing the gas\, drumroll please\, YOU NOW HAVE A CHOICE! Compare rates with Ohio Natural Gas and go with the lowest to save on your natural gas bill!

\\n

It’s that simple. If you have any questions or need more information on natural gas\, please call us at 1-888-466-4427. We are here to help.

\\n

Natural gas deregulation gives customers the choice to purchase natural gas from suppliers other than their traditional utility company. Ohio Natural Gas is a PUCO-certified natural gas supplier that you may select for your natural gas needs in Ohio. Would you like price stability? Ohio Natural Gas can offer various fixed plans to meet your needs. Should you choose Ohio Natural Gas as your natural gas supplier\, your local utility company in all cases will still maintain distribution channels that deliver gas to your home.

\\n

Need more information on natural gas? Try one of our other questions    
\\n

\\n"},{"termstitle":"Who is Ohio Natural Gas?"\,"termsdescription":"

Who are any of us\, really? Kidding\, you came here for information on natural gas\, so here goes. Ohio Natural Gas is a division of SouthStar Energy Services®\, a preeminent retail natural gas marketing company operating in eight states. SouthStar Energy Services combines the expertise and assets of a national supplier with the local market knowledge of a regional supplier and has the financial and structural resources needed to provide reliable and cost-effective natural gas.

\\n

For nearly 20 years\, SouthStar has built on the expertise of its parent company\, Southern Company Gas. A history of solid financial performance and stability\, as well as sophisticated in-house financial trading and risk management\, has placed SouthStar in a position of leadership.
\\n

\\n"},{"termstitle":"Why should I select Ohio Natural Gas as my natural gas supplier?"\,"termsdescription":"

Simply put\, we offer customers innovative products at great prices. Make the switch to a lower price and make your wallet breathe a little easier.

\\n

When you lock in your natural gas price for the next 6 or 12 months with ONG you can avoid price spikes and fluctuations. You don’t have this option with your regulated utility company\, but you do with us?
\\n

\\n"},{"termstitle":"What about my gas bill\, what will change?"\,"termsdescription":"

You will continue to receive one bill from your local gas utility company. The only change you will see on your bill is Ohio Natural Gas supplying the gas commodity charges. Gas delivery charges will still originate from your local gas utility company. You will continue to make one payment to your utility company.

\\n

 

\\n

Need more information on natural gas? Try one of our other questions.
\\n

\\n"},{"termstitle":"How can I enroll with Ohio Natural Gas?"\,"termsdescription":"

That’s our favorite question. Enrolling is a simple process. Have a copy of your latest bill and call our Customer Care Center at 1-888-466-4427\, Monday-Friday from 8AM – 5PM ET to enroll or if you have questions about information on natural gas.
\\n

\\n"},{"termstitle":"Can I continue to participate on my utility’s budget billing program if I select Ohio Natural Gas?"\,"termsdescription":"

Yes\, selecting Ohio Natural Gas as your supplier will not affect your billing and payment options.

\\n

Additional questions about information on natural gas? Call 1-888-466-4427 to speak with one of our customer service representatives.
\\n

\\n"}]
